display_long_description:
A virtual reality platform in three versions for Android and iOS devices, and a special version for Meta Quest 2 virtual reality glasses.
This platform is a complete virtual city for a 12 years old Shia child, with various places, including: the cinema, the games center, the mosque, the school, and the market, with sound, purposeful, and educational content for the Shia child.
The cinema contains educational and moral films, programmes, and animations for children, and this content was collected from media and cultural centers in various place of the world.
Various centers from several countries in the world also participated in the games center.
The mosque, the school, and the market are several places for all Shia parties to display their activities and events.
The city contains moral and educational tasks for the child, such as: helping the elderly and helping others in the city.
One of the project's goals is to provide a safe environment for our children as an alternative solution to the games in the playground for our families, as well as educating and raising a leadership generation for a pioneering future and other goals.
Our ambition is to expand the project to all age groups in the future.
